This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

Meeting Schedule

View the 2026 Township Council Meeting Schedule (PDF).

Meeting Documents

Council Agendas, Minutes, Ordinances, and Resolutions can be found by visiting IQM2 Intelligent Meeting Management.

Open Public Meetings Act

The township follows the requirements of N.J.S.A 10:4-12, the public comment portion of the Open Public Meetings Act, commonly known as the Sunshine Law.

This information is available to engage the public on the Bloomfield Open Public Records page.

Video Coverage of Past Meetings

Please see video versions of past meetings on Bloomfield WBMA Television.
